title: Pulsefire Ezreal is bugged. Please fix him.
body:
The moment Ezreal gets his new armor at lvl 6 (by levelling Trueshot Barrage), his name disappears from the chat when you talk.

For example:

[All] LordPoutine (Ezreal) : get on my level Kappa 
^ That would be the correct one (it's like this when you're level 1/5 and still haven't levelled Trueshot Barrage)

The bugged version is:
[All] LordPoutine () : get on my level Kappa

Basically, Ezreal disappears from the () once he gets his new armor.

Please Riot, fix Pulsie :[

**THIS BUG ONLY OCCURS WITH PULSEFIRE EZREAL**
